Article Title: India vs New Zealand ODI 2026 squad announcement - All you need to know
Article Text:
Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma (AFP Photo)

India T20 World Cup squad: In search of ideal combination, Agarkar & Co. drop Shubman Gill

Ind vs NZ ODI 2026 squad announcement: All you need to know



New Zealand's ODI squad vs India

New

India vs New Zealand - Full ODI Schedule

Date Venue Time Sun, Jan 11, 2026 Vadodara, BCA Stadium, Kotambi 1:30 PM IST Wed, Jan 14, 2026 Rajkot, Niranjan Shah Stadium, Khandheri 1:30 PM IST Sun, Jan 18, 2026 Indore, Holkar Cricket Stadium 1:30 PM IST

India vs New Zealand - Full T20I Schedule

Date Venue Time Wed, Jan 21, 2026 Nagpur, Vidarbha Cricket Association Stadium 7:00 PM IST Fri, Jan 23, 2026 Raipur, Shaheed Veer Narayan Singh International Stadium 7:00 PM IST Sun, Jan 25, 2026 Guwahati, Barsapara Cricket Stadium 7:00 PM IST Wed, Jan 28, 2026 Visakhapatnam, ACA-VDCA Cricket Stadium 7:00 PM IST Sat, Jan 31, 2026 Thiruvananthapuram, Greenfield International Stadium 7:00 PM IST

NEW DELHI: India are set to host New Zealand for a high-profile eight-match limited-overs series beginning on January 11. The tour will feature three One-Day Internationals and five Twenty20 Internationals, with matches scheduled across multiple venues in the country through January 31.The series comes at a crucial juncture, with several senior players returning to the ODI format and the T20 side looking to fine-tune combinations ahead of the ICC T20 World Cup 2026, which gets underway on February 7 in India and Sri Lanka.The ODI leg of the series is expected to draw significant attention, particularly with stalwarts Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma making their anticipated return to the 50-over format after the South Africa series.Meanwhile, the T20Is will act as a final testing phase for Suryakumar Yadav-led Indian side as they prepare for their T20 World Cup title defence.While the BCCI has already announced the T20I squad for the New Zealand series, the ODI squad is yet to be named.The BCCI selection committee is likely to hold an online meeting around January 3 or 4 to finalise the ODI squad for the home series against New Zealand.New Zealand have already announced their T20I and ODI squads for India series.Michael Bracewell (C), Adi Ashok, Kristian Clarke, Josh Clarkson, Devon Conway, Zak Foulkes, Mitch Hay, Kyle Jamieson, Nick Kelly, Jayden Lennox, Daryl Mitchell, Henry Nicholls, Glenn Phillips, Michael Rae, Will Young: Suryakumar Yadav (C), Abhishek Sharma, Sanju Samson, Tilak Varma, Hardik Pandya, Shivam Dube, Axar Patel, Rinku Singh, Jasprit Bumrah, Harshit Rana, Arshdeep Singh, Kuldeep Yadav, Varun Chakaravarthy, Washington Sundar, Ishan Kishan: Mitchell Santner (C), Michael Bracewell, Mark Chapman, Devon Conway, Jacob Duffy, Zak Foulkes, Matt Henry, Kyle Jamieson, Bevon Jacobs, Daryl Mitchell, James Neesham, Glenn Phillips, Rachin Ravindra, Tim Robinson, Ish Sodhi
Article Summary: India set to host new zealand for a high-profile limited-overs series beginning on january 11. The tour will feature three one-day internationals and five twenty20 internationals, with matches scheduled across multiple venues in the country through january 31.

Article Title: ‚ÄúSome things are meant to be left‚Äù: Paul Skenes' girlfriend Olivia Dunne reacts to viral emotional game-day moment
Article Text:
Paul Skenes and Olivia Dunne (Image via: IG/X)

Paul Skenes‚Äô girlfriend Olivia Dunne takes playful jab at sister as past game-day reaction goes viral again



For Paul Skenes' girlfriend, Olivia Dunne, 2025 wasn‚Äôt just about closing the final chapter of her collegiate gymnastics career. It became a year shaped by transitions, public milestones, and moments that blurred the lines between athlete, celebrity, and devoted supporter. As she wrapped up her fifth and final season with the LSU Tigers, Dunne took time to reflect on a year that unfolded both on and off the mat.She recently posted a carousel of photos that summed up her 2025 era. But it was not the post that gained fans attention. What stood out more was Dunne‚Äôs emotional support for Paul Skenes during his final outing of the season, a moment her sister highlighted in the comments.The collection included her performing a floor routine for LSU, appearing on the cover of the 2025 Sports Illustrated Swimsuit edition, and walking the MLB All-Star red carpet for the second straight year. She summed it up simply: ‚Äú2025 wrappedü§∏‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüëôüå≠‚ÄùBut the most viral moment was missing, and her sister, Julz Dunne, made sure it didn‚Äôt stay forgotten. Julz reposted a short clip filmed at Great American Ball Park during the final start of the season for Dunne‚Äôs boyfriend, Paul Skenes. From the stands, Dunne was caught reacting in real time as Skenes recorded the final out, completing six scoreless innings to close out a dominant 2025 campaign. She pumped her fist, fully absorbed in the moment.The clip went viral for its unfiltered honesty. Cameras caught Dunne mid-celebration, sweat marks visible, emotion unguarded.It stood in sharp contrast to the polished images fans usually see. ‚Äúdon‚Äôt forget about this,‚Äù Julz wrote. Dunne‚Äôs replied playfully, ‚Äúsome things are meant to be left in 2025.‚ÄùThe ballpark scene of Olivia Dunne supporting Paul, went viral instantly, with fans applauding Dunne as a ‚Äòsupporting girlfriend‚Äô and pointing out how she is always present in the stands for Skenes‚Äô biggest moments.As the year ends, the viral moment offered a gentle remainder that the most meaningful memories are not always made under bright lights or on-stage. Sometimes they quietly unfolds under stands where genuine support feels unfiltered, imperfect and real.
Article Summary: Olivia dunne wrapped up her fifth and final season with the lsu tigers. She recently posted a carousel of photos that summed up her 2025 era. But the most viral moment was missing, and her sister, julz dunne, made sure it didn't stay forgotten.

Article Title: Justin Thomas‚Äôs net worth 2025: The rise of an American professional who dominated the PGA Tour
Article Text:
Justin Thomas‚Äôs net worth 2025: The rise of an American professional who dominated the PGA Tour (Image Via Getty Images)

Justin Thomas' net worth, earnings, and endorsements



Early life and golf roots of Justin Thomas

Justin Thomas‚Äôs rise on the PGA Tour

Recent updates and personal life of Justin Thomas

Also Read:

Justin Thomas is one of the biggest stars in modern golf. The American professional golfer competes on the PGA Tour and has won major championships at the highest level of the sport. Known for his calm approach and powerful swing, Thomas has built success through hard work, consistency, and smart decisions both on and off the golf course.Justin Thomas‚Äôs net worth is estimated at $30- $45 million. He has earned around $75 million from official PGA Tour prize money alone. When bonuses and endorsements are added, his total career earnings are close to $100 million.He has endorsement deals with major brands like Titleist, FootJoy, Ralph Lauren, NetJets, and WHOOP. These partnerships play a big role in his income outside golf.Justin Thomas was born on April 29, 1993, in Louisville, Kentucky. Golf runs deep in his family. His father, Mike Thomas, is a golf professional and helped train him from a young age. Justin went to St. Xavier High School, where he quickly became one of the best junior golfers in the country.After high school, Justin attended the University of Alabama. There, he played college golf for the Crimson Tide.In 2012, he won the Haskins Award, given to the best college golfer in the United States. In 2013, he helped Alabama win the national championship. Soon after, he decided to turn professional.Justin Thomas turned professional in 2013 and earned his PGA Tour card in 2015. His first big win came at the CIMB Classic in 2015, which he defended the next year. His career truly took off in 2017. That year, he won five PGA Tour events, including the PGA Championship. He also won the FedEx Cup, making it the best season of his career.Thomas reached world number one in the Official World Golf Ranking in 2018 and again in 2020. He won his second PGA Championship in 2022.Thomas has stayed active on the PGA Tour in recent years and keeps competing in important tournaments. Key player for Team USA in the Ryder Cup and Presidents Cup as well. He has frankly discussed his 2019 skin cancer diagnosis off the course and currently advocates sun safety and routine medical checkups. Justin Thomas remains one of golf‚Äôs most respected and popular players today.
Article Summary: Justin thomas‚Äôs net worth is estimated at $30- $45 million. He has earned around $75 million from official pga tour prize money alone. When bonuses and endorsements are added, his total career earnings are close to $100 million.

Article Title: NBA legend Stephen Curry's firstborn son Canon Curry stuns everyone with impressive dribble skills as fans call him 'Simba'
Article Text:
Image via Getty

Fans react to Canon Curry ‚Äôs impressive dribble skills

Image via NBA/Instagram (screengrab)

How many children do Stephen Curry and Ayesha Curry have?

Also Read

During a high-intensity game between the Golden State Warriors and the Brooklyn Nets, Stephen Curry‚Äôs eldest son decided to steal the limelight. The young kid pulled off some impressive dribbling skills, which stunned everyone. The clip went viral immediately and fan reactions started pouring in. Fans drew a reference to the famous movie The Lion King to describe the little kid. They called him Simba. Some of the fans have even stated that Canon is the only one who can break Stephen's records within the NBA This is a proud moment for the NBA legend. Stephen has had a great influence within the league. With his son showing off the skills at such a young age, fans have started expecting the young kid to be a potential ‚ÄúHall of Famer‚Äù if he ever decides to join the league. Recently, another clip had also gone viral where Stephen was spotted pulling off a secret handshake with his daughter Riley after a Warriors‚Äô win. Fans spotted Canon in that clip as well and some of them talked about the kind of attitude he was carrying in that video.The NBA uploaded the clip of young Canon Curry dribbling the balls at the courtside. He was simultaneously dribbling two balls with both his hands. The visuals of this stunned everyone present in the stadium.NBA, while posting the clip, wrote, ‚ÄúSeems like @stephencurry30 has been teaching Canon well ü§Ø‚Äù The clip went viral in moments and generated significant reactions from the fans.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.One of the fans with the username ki.Thegroomer wrote, ‚ÄúAww, he‚Äôs so cute.. WE NEED A CENTER!‚Äù Another fan immediately believed that the young prodigy would one day be a Hall of Famer. Christownsend901 commented, ‚ÄúI‚Äôve seen enough. HOFer üî•üòÇ‚Äù A third fan with the username Kjfocus imagined the kind of records that would get broken if Canon too joins his father in the league. They added, ‚ÄúOh no, it can‚Äôt be two of em üòÇ the league will never get a break, get ready for 700 threes in a season ü§£‚ÄùAnother fan with the username dagr85poohdini wrote, ‚ÄúOnly person who can break Steph's records!!!‚Äù A fan even drew a reference from the famous Lion King movie while appreciating the skills of the little boy. Dee_onthegrind commented, ‚ÄúSimba, one day this all will be yours.‚ÄùStephen Curry and Ayesha Curry are the parents to four adorable kids. Canon Curry is just 7 years old as of 2025. He was born on July 2, 2025. He is the first son of the NBA legend Stephen Curry. Before him, Stephen and Ayesha Curry birthed two daughters, Riley Elizabeth and Ryan Carson. Riley and Ryan were born in 2012 and 2015, respectively. The couple‚Äôs youngest child was born in 2024.
Article Summary: Stephen curry‚Äôs eldest son pulled off some impressive dribbling skills. The clip went viral immediately and fan reactions started pouring in. Fans drew a reference to the famous movie the lion king to describe the little kid. Some of the fans have even stated that canon is the only one who can break stephen's records.

Article Title: Ex-NFL star Dwight Freeney urges Maxx Crosby to consider leaving Raiders as $8B Chicago Bears seek game-changing pass rusher
Article Text:
Maxx Crosby urged to rethink Raiders future.Image via: Getty

Dwight Freeney explains why winning may push Maxx Crosby toward change



Also read

For a long time, Maxx Crosby was the last player anyone expected to question his future with the Las Vegas Raiders. He played hurt, spoke about loyalty, and made it clear he wanted to be part of the franchise‚Äôs turnaround. That is why the current situation feels different. As the offseason approaches, Crosby‚Äôs name is suddenly at the center of trade talk.The reason is simple. Winning has not followed him. Crosby has done his part year after year, but the Raiders have not taken the next step. Tensions inside the locker room have grown, and recent events around his health only added fuel to the conversation. Former players are now openly wondering if staying in Las Vegas still makes sense for him.Former NFL star Dwight Freeney shared his thoughts on Up & Adams, focusing on what Crosby is missing most in his career. ‚ÄúThe feeling of winning; there‚Äôs no feeling like that,‚Äù Freeney said. ‚ÄúWhen you win in the playoffs, and when you go to the playoffs, win a Super Bowl, those are the moments that stay with you forever.‚ÄùThe Raiders last made the playoffs in 2021. Since then, Crosby has collected Pro Bowl selections and signed a massive three-year, $106.5 million extension with $91.5 million guaranteed.His effort has never been questioned. His frustration, however, is becoming harder to ignore.Crosby injured his knee during the Raiders‚Äô 31-0 loss to the Kansas City Chiefs in Week 7 but kept playing. In Week 17, Las Vegas finally shut him down against the New York Giants, placing him on injured reserve even though he wanted to stay on the field. Head coach Pete Carroll later said Crosby could also miss the season finale. Reports followed that Crosby wanted to leave the facility after hearing the decision.The timing matters. Crosby‚Äôs contract looks huge, but it is flexible. If the Raiders move him early in the 2026 league year, the dead-cap hit is small and the cap savings are large. After March 17, trading him becomes far more difficult. He also has no guaranteed money after 2026, which puts pressure on both sides to act soon.Trade ideas are already forming. Kay Adams has openly backed the Chicago Bears. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm rooting for him to be a Bear,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs a Michigan kid. He‚Äôs going to thrive in the cold, wherever that stadium is built.‚ÄùTeams like the Baltimore Ravens, Dallas Cowboys, Los Angeles Chargers, Detroit Lions, and Cincinnati Bengals could also make sense. But, nothing is decided yet.
Article Summary: Dwight freeney explains why winning may push maxx crosby toward change. Crosby injured his knee during the raiders‚Äô 31-0 loss to the kansas city chiefs in week 7 but kept playing. In week 17, las vegas finally shut him down against the new york giants.

Article Title: Top 5 NBA players who are Anime-heads
Article Text:
Zion Williamson (Image via Getty)

1. Zion Williamson (New Orleans Pelicans)



2. De'Aaron Fox (Sacramento Kings)



3. Daniel Gafford (Dallas Mavericks)



Do y‚Äôall agree with Max‚Äôs answers?! ü§£ #anime #nba #dallasmavericks

4. Jaylen Brown (Boston Celtics)



5. Steven Adams (Houston Rockets)



Anime has come a long way from getting fully Americanized and rewritten to upholding its authenticity. It transcended the niche fandom and language barriers and showed people the world above the subtitles. In the era of global connectivity, the bridge between world-class athleticism and anime has never been shorter. And the NBA is not untouched by this wave.It is no longer surprising to see world-class athletes rocking a Naruto cloak on the hardwood or discussing the nuances of Jujutsu Kaisen during a post-game presser. Zion Williamson once famously estimated that 80% of the league watches anime, and today, that passion is visible in custom sneakers, tattoos, and pre-game rituals. Here are five NBA stars who truly live the "otaku" life.Zion isn't just a casual viewer, he is essentially the league's anime ambassador, especially after tattooing Naruto‚Äôs Eight Trigrams seal on his stomach. His obsession with Naruto is so deep that he has collaborated with Jordan Brand on several Naruto-inspired colorways like Rasengan. To Zion, the show is a blueprint for his career, dealing with massive expectations and internal power.He famously wore a Hokage-style outfit to Comic-Con and views the protagonist, Naruto‚Äôs way of the Ninja, as a direct parallel to his own journey through injury and scrutiny.The Kings‚Äô explosive guard is a lifelong Dragon Ball Z fanatic. Fox has often credited the high energy of the series for his style of play. He identifies most with Vegeta, the Prince of Saiyans, admiring the character's relentless passion and drive to surpass his rivals. Fox‚Äôs love for the anime can be seen through his special Dragon Ball edition sneakers with a custom "Vegeta" logo featured. He has been frequently spotted at conventions, proving his fandom goes far beyond just watching the show on the team plane.Mavericks‚Äô Daniel Gafford is an avid anime fan, especially of Dragon Ball Z and recently of Demon Slayer. He has a prominent tattoo of Goku, Vegeta, and Gohan on his left knee, representing his admiration for his childhood heroes. Recently, Gafford also added a fresh tattoo on his hand of Rengoku from Demon Slayer. Gafford doesn't just watch for the action, he uses it as a mental reset to never give up.Celtics star guard Jaylen Brown is a known anime fan and is drawn to the creative storytelling, along with the psychological and philosophical plots. He has praised Death Note for its complex morality and Demon Slayer for its stunning animation. The 2024 Finals MVPviews anime as something that challenges the brain and often shares his recommendations with younger teammates to help them expand their creative horizons beyond the court.The NBA‚Äôs strongest man and Rockets star center is a big One Piece fan. The anime‚Äôs pirate-like personality fits Adams perfectly. In an interview, Adams admitted that he spent much of his downtime during injury rehab catching up on the 1,000+ episodes of One Piece. In 2019, Crunchyroll tweeted promoting Steven Adams for the All-Star Game. Other anime that Adams has shown interest in are: One Punch Man, Naruto, and Hunter X Hunter.The stigma around being an anime-head in professional sports is slowly evaporating, and these players prove that you can be a ruthless competitor on the hardwood while still finding inspiration in the vibrant, emotional worlds of Japanese animation. Whether it‚Äôs a Kamehameha celebration or a custom pair of kicks, the Anime NBA era is officially here to stay.Also read: 6 heartwarming Klay Thompson and Megan Thee Stallion moments fans couldn‚Äôt stop smiling about in 2025
Article Summary: Anime has come a long way from getting fully americanized and rewritten to upholding its authenticity. Zion williamson once famously estimated that 80% of the league watches anime, and today, that passion is visible in custom sneakers, tattoos, and pre-game rituals. Rockets star center steven adams is a big one piece fan.

Article Title: Veteran fighter Sam-A Shares insights on ONE Championship between Prajanchai vs Aliff for the world title
Article Text:
Veteran fighter Sam-A Shares insights on ONE Championship between Prajanchai vs Aliff for the world title

Veteran Thai fighter Sam-a-gaiyanghadao is eagerly waiting for the proposed title clash between ONE strawweight Muay Thai world champion Prajanchai PK Saenchai and challenger Aliff Sor Dechapan to happen. Given how the protagonists tackle their matches, he expects the competition to go all the way.The former two-division, two-spot world champion expressed his opinions on the Prajanchai-Aliff title match involving ONE Championship, indicating that he anticipates a difficult bout with numerous in-fight adjustments.As Sam goes saying -‚ÄúI think it will go the distance with their styles. I favor Prajanchai because of his angles and craftiness. If he can get close and clinch, I think he wins 60-40 with his in-fight adjustments, craftiness, and experience because Prajanchai has fought taller opponents and opponents of the same height.‚ÄùSam-A One of the most well-known and veteran fighters in Thailand, expressed his thoughts on what could turn out to be one of the most interesting title fights in 2026.After winning from Ramadan Ondash of Lebanon, by decision at ONE Fight Night 38: Andrade vs.Baatarkhuu on December 5 at the Lumpinee Stadium in Bangkok, Thailand, Aliff was informed about the title shot. And that counted as his ninth win in 11 ONE Championship fights and his fifth consecutive, building up his standing as a bona-fide title contender.In the meantime, the second defense of the world title that Prajanchai reclaimed in December 2023 will take place in the proposed title match, which has not yet been assigned.Sam-A's outlook on the proposed fight between Prajanchai P.K.Saenchai and Aliff RakibIn Sam-A's recent interview with the media, Sam talked about the whatnot of the fight between Prajanchai and Aliff. Saying that he expects the fight to go the distance, without an early knockout or stoppage.After his impressive decision victory over Jaosuayai Mor Krungthepthonburi at ONE Friday Fights 137: Tawanchai vs. Liu on December 19 at Lumpinee Stadium, the 42-year-old fighter intensified his pursuit of the strawweight Muay Thai title. It was his second consecutive victory that created anticipation about a possible world championship.Sam-A won the title of the strawweight Muay Thai King in February 2020. In October 2020, he successfully defended himself from the Australian challenger, Josh Tonna. before losing to Prajanchai in July 2021.Also read: I'm Ready to Coach!‚Äù: Former world champion Shawn Porter shares impressive insights on his son‚Äôs early love for boxing
Article Summary: Veteran fighter sam-a shares insights on one championship between prajanchai vs aliff for the world title. The former two-division, two-spot world champion expressed his opinions on the prajanchai-aliff title match involving one championship.

Article Title: NBA injury report: When is Nikola Jokic returning? Exploring Denver Nuggets star's knee injury timeline, return date, latest updates and more
Article Text:
Nikola Jokic injury update (Image via NBA)

Nikola Jokic suffered a knee hyperextension vs Heat, MRI Tuesday, return timeline unclear

Nikola Jokic has faced multiple injuries over his career, with a fresh left knee setback in 2025 now under review

Fans of the Denver Nuggets are eagerly awaiting word on the condition of three-time MVP Nikola Jokic, who suffered a left knee injury against the Miami Heat on Monday night. With just six seconds remaining in the second quarter, Jokic sustained the injury. Despite being listed as questionable to return, he never played again.The Denver Nuggets may soon be put to the test after spending the offseason assembling a team that could at least survive without Nikola Jokic. Fans of the Nuggets and the NBA as a whole who like seeing an all-time great player fill the stat sheet were alarmed when Jokic left Monday night's game against the Miami Heat due to a knee injury and did not return.During Monday's game against the Heat, Jokic seemed to hyperextend his knee after teammate Spencer Jones stepped on him beneath the basket. A hyperextension is defined by the Cleveland Clinic as "an injury that happens when your knee is bent backward beyond its usual limit."Usually, a hyperextension is an occurrence that can result in knee ligament damage rather than a diagnosis in and of itself. Jokic must thus have an MRI on Tuesday to ascertain the precise nature of his knee injury.As they assess how long the former MVP will be sidelined, the Nuggets hope that Jokic largely avoided ligament injury, with the ACL being the most important of the group. Jokic, meanwhile, left with a noticeable limp after collapsing to the ground in agony and never came back.David Adelman, the coach of the Nuggets, claimed that Jokic realized the injury right away. On Thursday, January 1, 2026, the team will play the Raptors. Nuggets coach David Adelman said after the game:‚ÄúImmediately, he knew something was wrong‚Ä¶ This is part of the NBA. Anyone who gets hurt, it‚Äôs gut-wrenching, especially somebody as special as he is.‚ÄùApart from announcing that Jokic would get an MRI on Tuesday, Nuggets coach David Adelman was unable to provide much of an update following the defeat. Adelman stated that the Nuggets "will go through the process properly" and that he is "hoping for the best."It is anticipated that Jokic's timetable won't be known until after Tuesday's MRI.Jokic might still miss a lot of time even if he doesn't get a serious injury. That would be an uncommon development for the three-time MVP, who hasn't missed more than five straight games since 2017. During his rise to MVP status, Jokic established himself as one of the NBA's most resilient players.Throughout his career, Nikola sustained several serious injuries. This prevented him from appearing in court for a considerable amount of time. But each time he went back to the court, he made sure to make an impression.The athlete's most recent injury occurred during the Miami Heat game. Due to a serious knee injury, he was unable to play in the second half of the match. Let's examine all of the significant ailments the Nuggets player has suffered over his career while supporters wait for an update on his setback.Jokic's most recent injury was a left knee injury in 2025. It happened in the closing minutes of the Miami Heat game's first half. Jokic unintentionally tread on Spencer Jones' toes. Jokic did not return for the second half of the game after hobbling off the court. We are awaiting the team's comprehensive report.In terms of injuries, the athlete's year does not appear to be going well. Both Jokic and Jamal Murray had to miss a few games in the first half of the season owing to injuries. Jokic has a bruise to his right shooting elbow in addition to an ankle impingement that limited his range of motion. The sportsman was given a severe instruction to rest by Denver Nuggets coach Michael Malone. Jokic's ankle ailment kept him out of several games.Also read: "He wasn't the superstar he is now"- Michael Porter Jr. opens up on doubting Nikola Jokic‚Äôs greatness in Denver Nuggets training camp
Article Summary: Nikola jokic suffered a left knee injury against the miami heat on monday night. The three-time mvp will have an mri on tuesday to determine the exact nature of the injury. Jokic has suffered multiple injuries over his career, with a fresh left knee setback in 2025 now under review. Jokic's ankle ailment kept him out of several games.

Article Title: Nikita Kucherov finishes the year on good note as Tampa Bay Lightning star named NHL‚Äôs First Star of the Week
Article Text:
Nikita Kucherov named NHL First Star of the Week (Image via: Getty Images)

Nikita Kucherov named NHL‚Äôs First Star of the Week, Lightning get their game back on track



Ending the year on a good note, Nikita Kucherov has stepped up once again for the Tampa Bay Lightning at exactly the right time. The star forward has delivered a strong stretch of hockey, scoring four goals and putting up six points in his last three games while helping Tampa Bay win all three matchups during an important part of their season.This run has earned him the NHL‚Äôs First Star of the Week, and it feels fitting. Kucherov didn‚Äôt just pile up numbers in easy situations. He produced when games were physical, tense, and could have slipped away, showing the kind of control and composure that separates elite players from everyone else.The Lightning needed leadership and finishing, and Kucherov provided both. After a heated, demanding rivalry game against the Florida Panthers, Tampa Bay nearly let a comfortable 4‚Äì1 lead vanish against the Montreal Canadiens before pulling through in a shootout. Even with momentum swings and pressure moments, Kucherov stayed sharp, continued creating offense, and played with the calm presence his team relies on.His overall season numbers back up the recognition. With 17 goals and 49 points in 34 games, Kucherov remains one of the league‚Äôs top offensive producers and sits firmly in the NHL‚Äôs scoring race alongside names like Connor McDavid Nathan MacKinnon , Macklin Celebrini, and a handful of other elite forwards.His pace may be slightly behind last season‚Äôs extraordinary production, but that does not take away from the impact he is still having.There is also plenty of time ahead. With more than half the schedule still remaining, Kucherov has room to push his totals even higher and possibly work his way back toward the 120-point range once again. If he does that, the Art Ross Trophy conversation will quickly include him, although the competition remains extremely tight.For Tampa Bay, his current form brings stability and confidence. It reassures the team that their star forward is still driving the attack and capable of lifting them when games get difficult. For the wider NHL picture, it simply reinforces what has been true for years: when Kucherov is locked in, he remains one of the most dangerous and reliable offensive players in the league, and he is making sure the Lightning close the year with real momentum.Also Read: What is Nikita Kucherov's net worth in 2025? Details on Tampa Bay Lightning star's earnings, deals, endorsements
Article Summary: Nikita kucherov named nhl‚Äôs first star of the week, lightning get their game back on track. The star forward has delivered a strong stretch of hockey, scoring four goals and putting up six points in his last three games while helping tampa bay win all three matchups.

Article Title: Is Joel Embiid playing tonight vs the Memphis Grizzlies? Latest update on the Philadelphia 76ers star's injury report (December 30, 2025)
Article Text:
Joel Embiid (Image via Steven M Falk/Staff Photographer)

Joel Embiid‚Äôs status is still unclear

Joel Embiid‚Äôs Injury Situation vs Memphis Grizzlies (December 30, 2025)

How Joel Embiid Has Looked When He Plays

Philadelphia 76ers Injury Report and Rotation Outlook vs Memphiw Grizzlies (December 30, 2025)

Memphis Matchup and Game Outlook

ahead of the Philadelphia 76ers‚Äô game against the Memphis Grizzlies on December 30, 2025. The Sixers listed their star center as questionable, leaving his availability unresolved just hours before tip-off.Philadelphia enters the game at 16-14 and riding a three-game losing streak. Injuries have played a role in that slide, and Embiid‚Äôs absence has been especially noticeable. Memphis, sitting at 15-17, is dealing with its own inconsistencies, but the matchup carries weight for both teams as the season reaches its midpoint.Joel Embiid missed Philadelphia‚Äôs last game, a 129-104 loss to Oklahoma City, due to a right ankle sprain along with ongoing right knee injury management. The ankle issue is new, while the knee has been a recurring problem throughout the season.He has since been upgraded from out to questionable. Head coach Nick Nurse is expected to make a final decision after his pregame evaluation. At 31, Embiid has already missed enough games to put award eligibility at risk, making every lineup decision more significant.Before sitting out against the Thunder, Joel Embiid showed he can still control games when available.He scored 31 points against Chicago, shooting 10-of-19 from the field in 32 minutes.On the season, he is averaging 21.8 points, 6.5 rebounds, and 2.8 assists while shooting 44.3 percent. Those numbers are lower than his MVP season, but his presence still changes how defenses play Philadelphia.The Philadelphia 76ers remain thin in other areas. Kelly Oubre Jr. is out with a left knee sprain, and Trendon Watford continues to miss time due to a left adductor strain. Two-way players MarJon Beauchamp and Johni Broome are listed as doubtful.Tyrese Maxey and Paul George are expected to play. Maxey has carried the offense at 30.7 points per game. If Embiid cannot go, Quentin Grimes and Andre Drummond take on larger roles, with Drummond anchoring the paint.The Memphis Grizzlies are ninth in the West and rely heavily on Jaren Jackson Jr. for interior defense. If Embiid plays, that matchup will be central to the game.Also read: Philadelphia 76ers vs Memphis Grizzlies regular season game: Full injury report, who's out, where to watch, and more (December 30, 2025) Philadelphia opened as a 1.5-point favorite with a total of 233.5, but Embiid‚Äôs status keeps the outlook uncertain. Until the final call is made, the balance of this game remains unsettled.
Article Summary: Joel embiid is listed as questionable for the philadelphia 76ers' game against the memphis grizzlies on december 30, 2025. The center has missed the last three games due to an ankle sprain and ongoing right knee injury management. The grizzlies are ninth in the west and rely heavily on jaren jackson jr. for interior defense.

Article Title: Kyren Williams injury update: Latest news on Rams RB's status
Article Text:
Image via IMAGN

What happened to Kyren Williams in Week 17?

What this means for the Rams

Also Read:

The Los Angeles Rams took a breath of relief after Week 17, as concerns around Kyren Williams‚Äô health ultimately proved to be a scare rather than a setback. The Rams‚Äô lead running back was evaluated late during the game against the Atlanta Falcons, but all signs now point toward him being available moving forward.Williams, who has been central to Sean McVay‚Äôs offensive plans this season, briefly raised alarm bells when he appeared to be dealing with ankle discomfort during the fourth quarter. Television cameras caught the 25-year-old wincing on the sideline, prompting speculation about another potential injury at a critical stage of the year.Williams admitted postgame that he was checked for an ankle issue late in the loss to Atlanta. The concern stemmed from multiple awkward tackles around his lower leg and ankle area, including one at the end of a key 22-yard run in the closing stages.However, Williams revealed that recent medical history worked in his favor. He credited a previous tightrope procedure designed to stabilize the ankle joint for preventing what could have been a far more serious injury. The running back did not miss any snaps and finished the game strongly despite the brief evaluation.As of now, the Rams have not placed Williams on the injury report with any major designation. There is no indication that he suffered a high-ankle sprain or structural damage, and team officials remain optimistic about his availability.The situation is especially significant given the Rams‚Äô thin backfield depth at the moment. Blake Corum exited the game earlier with injury and did not return after halftime, while Ronnie Rivers was forced into a larger role behind Williams. Had Williams gone down as well, Los Angeles would have been left dangerously short-handed.Williams‚Äô importance to the Rams cannot be overstated. Against the Falcons, he finished with 92 rushing yards on 13 carries and added 38 receiving yards, with most of his production coming in the second half. His ability to push through discomfort and remain effective highlighted his value as both a runner and a pass-catching option.With the postseason picture already settled for Los Angeles, maintaining Williams‚Äô health is now a priority rather than pushing him unnecessarily. Head coach Sean McVay is expected to take a cautious approach if there is any lingering soreness, especially with Corum‚Äôs status still uncertain.Barring any setbacks in practice, Kyren Williams is expected to remain available for the Rams in the season finale and beyond. While the ankle scare drew attention, the outcome appears favorable, with no long-term concerns at this stage.
Article Summary: Los angeles rams running back kyren williams was evaluated for an ankle injury late in the game against the atlanta falcons. The 25-year-old is expected to be available for the rams in the season finale and beyond. There is no indication that he suffered a high-ankle sprain or structural damage.

Article Title: Taylor Swift spotted at Kansas City Chiefs‚Äô Christmas party amid rising retirement speculation around Travis Kelce
Article Text:
Taylor Swift joins Chiefs‚Äô Christmas celebration (Image via: Getty Images)

Chiefs enter final game with growing questions over Travis Kelce ‚Äôs retirement and playing status



Taylor Swift‚Äôs Christmas Day appearance at Arrowhead Stadium wasn‚Äôt the only time she was around the Kansas City Chiefs during the holiday season. While she was seen supporting fianc√© Travis Kelce during the game, another moment from her time with the team quietly surfaced later and offered a calmer, more personal glimpse into the festive week.A year-end Instagram Reel shared by Ana Demmer, partner of Chiefs center Creed Humphrey, included a photo from a Chiefs holiday gathering. The image showed several players‚Äô partners posing together, and Swift appeared casually in the back-left corner. Brittany Mahomes stood on the opposite side in a blue dress, while Swift‚Äôs familiar red lipstick stood out even though her full look wasn‚Äôt visible. It was a simple snapshot, but it highlighted how she has become naturally present around the team and the people connected to it.With off-field moments noted, attention turns directly back to football. The Kansas City Chiefs have just one regular-season game remaining on January 4 against the Las Vegas Raiders on the road. Their loss to the Los Angeles Chargers on December 14 confirmed that the Chiefs are out of postseason contention, meaning this final matchup will officially close their 2025‚Äì26 campaign.That situation has intensified discussion around Kelce at a professional level.Two straightforward questions surround him at this stage: Will he play in the final game, and is this going to be his last NFL season? His workload, age, and long career have already fueled conversations about whether retirement may come sooner rather than later. Missing the playoffs adds another layer to that conversation, simply because it marks the end of competitive football for the team this season, and decisions often take shape around moments like this.Kelce remains a central figure in Kansas City, and any decision he makes carries real importance for the organization. Whether he suits up against the Raiders or not, the final game becomes significant because of what it could represent for both the veteran tight end and the Chiefs moving forward.As the regular season winds down, the Chiefs finish a challenging year, and clarity on Kelce‚Äôs future becomes the key storyline. For now, all attention stays on January 4.Also Read: "Time will tell if...": Jason Kelce's subtle reveal hints at an unconventional wedding for Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce
Article Summary: Taylor swift was spotted at the kansas city chiefs' christmas celebration. She was seen supporting fianc√© travis kelce during the game. The chiefs have just one regular-season game remaining on january 4 against the las vegas raiders. There are growing questions over kelce‚Äôs retirement and playing status for that game.

Article Title: Who is Khushi Mukherjee? Reality TV actor who claimed Suryakumar Yadav 'used to message me'
Article Text:
Suryakumar Yadav, Khushi Mukherjee

Suryakumar Yadav press conference: What he said on his poor form

Who is Khushi Mukherjee?

Actress and model Khushi Mukherjee has made a public claim involving Indian men's T20I team captain Suryakumar Yadav , saying that the batter had sent her messages frequently in the past.Speaking at a recent event, Khushi said that Suryakumar used to message her often earlier, but they are no longer in touch. When asked by a reporter if she wanted to date a cricketer, Khushi said she does not want to be linked with any player."I don't want to date any cricketer. There are so many cricketers after me. Suryakumar Yadav used to message me a lot," Khushi said.She further added, "Now we don't talk much, and I don't even want to be associated. I don't like any link-ups involving me."Suryakumar Yadav has not responded to these statements so far.Meanwhile, Suryakumar and his wife Devisha Shetty recently visited the Sri Venkateswara Swamy Temple in Tirumala, Andhra Pradesh, where they offered prayers on the occasion of Vaikuntha Ekadashi.Suryakumar last played for India in the recent T20I series against South Africa, where he led the team to a 3-1 series win. He is next set to captain India in a five-match T20I series against New Zealand in January 2026. The series will act as preparation for the T20 World Cup, which begins on February 7.India will enter the tournament as defending champions after winning the T20 World Cup in 2024 in Barbados, where they defeated South Africa in the final.Khushi Mukherjee is a Bollywood actress and model who has also appeared on reality television, including MTV Splitsvilla. Her comments about Suryakumar Yadav gained attention online and led to increased searches for her name.She has also worked in Indian television shows, including SAB TV‚Äôs fantasy series Balveer Returns and the mythological show Kahat Hanuman Jai Shri Ram on &TV.In recent times, Khushi has been in the public eye for her fashion choices.
Article Summary: Khushi mukherjee says suryakumar yadav used to message her often. She says they are no longer in touch and she does not want to be linked with any cricketer. The bollywood actress and model has been in the public eye for her fashion choices.

Article Title: Not Yashasvi Jaiswal or Mohammed Siraj: These four Indians feature in Cricket Australia's Test XI of 2025
Article Text:
Indian players stand for their national anthem before the start of the 1st test match against South Africa, at Eden Gardens in Kolkata. (ANI File Photo)

Why Gautam Gambhir needs to rethink the extra batting cushion in 2026

Cricket Australia‚Äôs Best Test XI of 2025:

KL Rahul (India), Travis Head (Australia), Joe Root (England), Shubman Gill (India), Temba Bavuma (South Africa, captain), Alex Carey (Australia, wicketkeeper), Ben Stokes (England), Mitchell Starc (Australia), Jasprit Bumrah (India), Scott Boland (Australia), Simon Harmer (South Africa)

12th man: Ravindra Jadeja (India)

Test cricket in 2025 saw several major moments. South Africa won the World Test Championship final against Australia at Lord‚Äôs and then went on to beat India in India. England and India played a high-profile series marked by large scores and key passages of play. The Ashes began with strong build-up, however, Australia has already secured the urn by winning the first three Tests, as the scoreline currently stands at 3-1. The yearalso had unusual moments, including Wiaan Mulder declaring while 34 runs short of Brian Lara‚Äôs 400 not out.As the year draws to a close, a number of players delivered notable performances in Test cricket. Based on those displays, Cricket Australia announced its Test XI of the year for 2025.Australia have four players in the XI despite losing the Test mace. They won nine of their 11 Tests during the year. India also have four representatives, including Ravindra Jadeja named as the 12th man. England and South Africa have two players each in the side.India‚Äôs selections include Shubman Gill, KL Rahul and Jasprit Bumrah. Cricket Australia said Jadeja narrowly missed out on a place in the XI, with England all-rounder Ben Stokes being preferred.Gill scored 983 runs in 16 innings in 2025. Rahul finished the year with 813 runs from 19 innings. Bumrah took 31 wickets in 14 innings.For the captaincy, Cricket Australia chose South Africa skipper Temba Bavuma. The other South African in the XI is off-spinner Simon Harmer. Harmer played four Tests during the year, as Keshav Maharaj featured in the WTC final instead. Harmer took 17 wickets in the two-Test series win over India, averaging 8.94, which is the best average by a visiting spinner in a series in India.
Article Summary: Australia have four players in the xi despite losing the test mace. India also have four representatives, including ravindra jadeja as the 12th man. England and south africa have two players each in the side. Cricket australia said jadeja narrowly missed out on a place.

Article Title: History for India! Arjun Erigaisi becomes first since Viswanathan Anand to podium in World Rapid & Blitz
Article Text:
Arjun Erigaisi (Photo by FIDE/Lennart Ootes)

GM Bibisara Assaubayeva Exclusive: Sindarov‚Äôs World Cup win, Candidates ambitions, and more #chess

ALSO READ:

NEW DELHI: India had a proud moment at the World Rapid and Blitz Chess Championships as Arjun Erigaisi delivered a double medal performance on Tuesday in Doha, Qatar.The 22-year-old chess star won bronze medals in both the Rapid and Blitz events. With the medals, he also became the first Indian player to register podium finishes at both events since Viswanathan Anand won the Rapid section and finished third in Blitz back in 2017.This came after he had already won a bronze in the Rapid section earlier in the tournament. Winning medals in both formats at the same championship is very rare and shows the player's consistency. However, the result could have been even better for the Telangana-born Grandmaster.On Tuesday, Arjun faced Nodirbek Abdusattorov in the semifinals of the World Blitz Championship. Abdusattorov won the first two games, while the third game ended in a draw.As a result, Arjun had to settle for the bronze medal, while five-time World Champion and top-ranked chess player Magnus Carlsen and Abdusattorov moved on to play the final, where Carlsen's astute end-game manoeuvres eventually earned him a coveted win over Abdusattorov with a 2.5-1.5 score.Subsequently, Carlsen clinched the Blitz gold here as well after becoming champion in the Rapid section on Sunday.On the other hand, Bibisara Assaubayeva of Kazakhstan became the Women's World Blitz Champion.Despite the disappointment at the end, Arjun‚Äôs overall performance in the Blitz Championship was impressive.On both occasions, Arjun came very close to reaching the final and fighting for the championship title.He topped the Swiss segment of the Blitz tournament with a strong score of 15 points out of 19. But perhaps luck was not in his favour.Still, the bigger picture remains very positive.Arjun Erigaisi finished third in the Blitz event and added another bronze medal to his tally, meaning he has wrapped up his final tournament of the year, the World Rapid and Blitz Championships, with two bronze medals.While the ending may have been painful for him and his fans, as the result could've been better, Arjun‚Äôs performance showed that he belongs among the world‚Äôs best.
Article Summary: Arjun erigaisi won bronze medals in both the rapid and blitz events. The 22-year-old became the first indian player to register podium finishes at both events since viswanathan anand won the rapid section and finished third in blitz in 2017.

Article Title: Minnesota Wild and Quinn Hughes look to take another win against San Jose Sharks
Article Text:
Mats Zuccarello with the Minnesota Wild (Via Getty Images)

Minnesota Wild continue to win games with the addition of Quinn Hughes

Hayes: 'There is an avenue for Celebrini to win the Hart'

San Jose Sharks proving they belong in playoff conversation

Also Read:

The Minnesota Wild travel to San Jose on Wednesday afternoon, looking to extend their impressive road winning streak. The franchise has won four consecutive games away from home as part of a dominant stretch that has them sitting near the top of the Central Division standings.The Sharks present an interesting challenge as one of the league's surprise teams this season. San Jose won the previous meeting between these clubs 2-1 in overtime, giving them confidence heading into Wednesday's rematch.Minnesota enters Wednesday's contest with a stellar 24-10-6 record and 54 points. The Wild have been particularly effective away from home, posting an impressive 11-6-1 mark in road games this season.The team boasts a plus-20 scoring differential with 123 goals scored and just 103 allowed through 40 games. Those numbers reflect a balanced attack that can both generate offense and play solid defense when needed.Over their last 10 games, Minnesota has gone 8-1-1 while averaging 4.1 goals per game. The Wild have averaged just three penalties and 6.6 penalty minutes while giving up only 2.2 goals per game during that stretch.The combination of offensive firepower and defensive responsibility has fueled their recent success. Kirill Kaprizov leads Minnesota with 23 goals and 24 assists through 40 games. Matthew Boldy has been red hot lately with nine goals and six assists over the past 10 contests, providing secondary scoring behind the superstar winger.San Jose has surprised many around the league with their performance this season. While Macklin Celebrini has been sensational with his points production, as the youngster has amassed 60 points in 39 games, the Sharks themselves sit at 19-17-3 with 41 points, keeping them in the thick of the Pacific Division playoff race.The team has been solid at home, posting a 10-7-3 record at SAP Center. San Jose has gone 17-5-2 in games where they score at least three goals, demonstrating their ability to win shootouts when the offense is clicking.While Tyler Toffoli paces the Sharks with 10 goals and 16 assists, Celebrini has delivered on the hype with seven goals and 13 assists over the last 10 games, giving San Jose a building block for the future.The Sharks have gone 6-4-0 over their past 10 contests while averaging 3.8 goals per game. However, they've also given up 3.5 goals per game during that span, highlighting defensive concerns that Minnesota could exploit.Both teams enter Wednesday's matchup healthy with no injuries listed. Puck drop is scheduled for 4 p.m. EST at SAP Center as the Wild look to extend their road winning streak to five games while the Sharks aim to replicate their overtime victory from the previous meeting.
Article Summary: The minnesota wild travel to san jose on wednesday afternoon. The wild have won four consecutive games away from home. San jose won the previous meeting between these clubs 2-1 in overtime. The sharks are one of the league's surprise teams this season.

Article Title: Carolina Hurricanes defenseman K‚ÄôAndre Miller returns after lower-body injury ahead of key NHL game
Article Text:
K'Andre Miller of the Carolina Hurricanes against the Tampa Bay Lightning (Credit: Getty Images)

K‚ÄôAndre Miller back in Carolina Hurricanes lineup in upcoming game



Defenseman of the Carolina Hurricanes, K'Andre Miller, returned to the ice following his absence as a result of a lower-body injury sustained on December 23 in a game against the Florida Panthers. The introduction of Miller is a big boost to the Hurricanes, who have been dealing with injuries throughout their roster over the last few weeks. His comeback offers insight into the blue line as the club gears up to play NHL games.Miller had had a short-term sidelining, including missing the team on Saturday, but he was at full practice on Sunday. Rod Brind'Amour, who is the head coach, said that he was sure that Miller is ready, as the defenseman could solidify the defense of the Hurricanes and the morale of the team as well.K-Andre has passed the test of playing and has looked solid in training, Brind-Amour said. The Hurricanes have been going through a difficult period, and their goaltender, Pyotr Kochetkov, will not be available for all of the season after he chose to undergo surgery due to his long-standing lower-body problem.The substitution of a more seasoned defensive presence enables Brind‚ÄôAmour to reposition pairings when Miller comes back.In the recent games, Carolina has changed its defense, and Shayne Gostisbehere has to manage some minor injuries, besides Gavin Bayreuther shifting between the AHL and NHL.Having Miller back, the Hurricanes are optimistic about continuing their good performance in the Eastern Conference and coping with the effects of other absences. His skating and defense awareness will play significant roles when it comes to regulating the speed with tough players on the field in future NHL games.Also Read: Net worth of Auston Matthews in 2025: Details on Vegas Golden Knights captain's earnings, salary, and contracts
Article Summary: K‚Äôandre miller back in carolina hurricanes lineup in upcoming game against tampa bay lightning. Miller had been sidelined since december 23 due to a lower-body injury. The hurricanes have been dealing with injuries throughout their roster over the last few weeks.

Article Title: Aaron Rodgers shows respect to rookie Shedeur Sanders after Browns upsets Steelers in Week 17
Article Text:
Image via Getty

A moment of respect after a frustrating loss

Shedeur Sanders continues to grow under pressure

Shedeur Sanders Postgame Press Conference | Week 17 vs. Pittsburgh Steelers

Also Read:

The Cleveland Browns‚Äô 13-6 upset win over the Pittsburgh Steelers in Week 17 delivered more than just a shake-up in the AFC playoff picture. It also produced a rare postgame moment that resonated well beyond the final score, as veteran quarterback Aaron Rodgers shared a message of encouragement with Browns rookie Shedeur Sanders.With Pittsburgh needing a victory to clinch the AFC North, the pressure was squarely on Rodgers and the Steelers offense. Instead, Cleveland‚Äôs defense controlled the tempo, and Sanders did just enough to guide the Browns to a gritty divisional win. But it was what happened after the final whistle that lingered longest.As cameras rolled on the field at Huntington Bank Field, Rodgers was spotted approaching Sanders with a smile. Despite the disappointment of a loss that complicated Pittsburgh‚Äôs postseason path, the 42-year-old quarterback took time to acknowledge the rookie‚Äôs effort.‚ÄúGood job, man. Rooting for you. I‚Äôm proud of you,‚Äù Rodgers was heard telling Sanders, a brief exchange that quickly made the rounds on social media.For Sanders, still navigating the steep learning curve of his first NFL season, the words carried weight. Praise from a future Hall of Famer, especially one known for his competitive edge, offered validation during a year filled with scrutiny and adjustment.On the field, Sanders‚Äô performance reflected progress rather than polish. He finished the game with controlled decision-making, avoided major mistakes, and leaned on the Browns‚Äô defense to secure the win. The result moved him to 2-4 as a starter, a modest record that nonetheless highlights incremental growth.Facing a Steelers defense built on pressure and physicality, Sanders showed composure in key moments. While Cleveland‚Äôs offense scored just 13 points, it was enough on a day when defense ruled.After the game, Sanders downplayed the significance of sharing the field with Rodgers, sticking to the grounded tone that has defined his rookie season. At just 23, he has repeatedly emphasized learning and enjoyment over legacy moments.Sanders also received encouragement from Steelers head coach Mike Tomlin, who embraced the rookie and offered his own words of support. The exchange underscored a broader theme from Sunday: respect across generations, even in defeat.The moment carried an added historical layer. Nearly two decades ago, Sanders‚Äô father, Deion Sanders, faced Rodgers when the latter was a rookie in Green Bay. This time, the roles were reversed: Rodgers the veteran, Sanders the newcomer with Cleveland emerging on top.For the Cleveland Browns, the win offered reassurance amid a rebuilding season. For the Pittsburgh Steelers, it meant a delayed celebration and a tense Week 18 ahead.And for Shedeur Sanders, the quiet exchange with Aaron Rodgers became a reminder that even in a learning season, respect from the league‚Äôs elite can mark meaningful progress.
Article Summary: Cleveland browns rookie shedeur sanders received a rare moment of respect from aaron rodgers. Rodgers told sanders, "good job, man. Rooting for you. I'm proud of you" sanders' father, deion, faced rodgers when the latter was a rookie in green bay.

Article Title: ‚ÄúThe love in Africa‚Äù: IShowSpeed‚Äôs Africa tour turns into an unforgettable personal journey, teases insightful details about his roots
Article Text:
IShowSpeed (via Getty Images)

From overwhelming love in Angola to a personal DNA reveal planned for the tour finale

irl stream in Angola üá¶üá¥





Darren Watkins, aka ‚ÄúIShowSpeed,‚Äù has been teasing his Africa tour for quite some time, and the popular streamer kept his word. The 20-year-old YouTube and Twitch star officially kicked off his highly anticipated Speed Does Africa tour on December 29, 2025, starting in Angola. He was immediately struck by the ambiance and the welcome he received during his stream.Watkins was also pretty much swept up by all the love and lively atmosphere during the tour while also reflecting on his Angolan roots. The streamer also promised fans that he would reveal proper detailed information about his ethnicity by the end of the tour. Safe to say, this journey has been his most personal and introspective so far among his travels around the world.Midway through his Angola broadcast, IShowSpeed paused to take in his environment and to reflect on what he was feeling in the moment. Surrounded by locals and the constant attention, the streamer could not hide his excitement. He told viewers, "Bro, I'm not going to lie, bro, I love the love in Africa, bro. The energy here is crazy. The energy and love, bro. I really do love the love and energy here, bro. Oh, I keep speaking Portuguese.That same stream also showed a rather quirky moment between Speed and a local individual. A man on a motorcycle approached Speed asking for money, leading to an awkward but calm exchange. Speed addressed it directly on stream, where he told the individual asking for $100 to wait, as he does not have cash at hand.Further on, Speed confirmed that his African tour will end with a long-awaited reveal of his ethnicity and DNA test results. He has teased this for months, telling fans he is 80% African and 20% European. During the Angola stream, he hinted strongly at Angolan roots, responding to a viewer‚Äôs question by saying, "'How much Angola DNA you have?' It's a lot. It's a lot of percent. I'm not going to reveal, like, how much percent. ‚ÄùWith plans to visit 20 countries, including Nigeria, Ghana, Egypt, Kenya, and Ivory Coast, Speed Does Africa is shaping up to be more than a tour for the streamer. It was a more personal and spiritual journey for a man coming back to his home country and connecting with his roots. With all the love and support he‚Äôs receiving, he is bound to revisit and feel it all over again.Also read: Full list of countries on IShowSpeed‚Äôs Africa tour as it officially begins
Article Summary: Darren watkins, aka "ishowspeed," officially kicked off his africa tour on december 29, 2025. The 20-year-old youtube and twitch star will visit 20 countries, including nigeria, ghana, egypt, kenya, and ivory coast. Speed confirmed that his african tour will end with a long-awaited reveal of his ethnicity.

Article Title: NHL Rumors: Marc-Andre Fleury‚Äôs comeback fuels rumors as NHL teams search for goalies
Article Text:
Pittsburgh Penguins goalie Marc-Andre Fleury acknowledges fans after being named the number one star in a pre-season NHL hockey game against the Columbus Blue Jackets in Pittsburgh, Saturday, Sept. 27, 2025. (AP Photo/Gene J. Puskar)

Veteran NHL goalie Marc-Andre Fleury set to make a comeback to the league soon

Also read:

Rumors around the NHL are intensifying around goaltender Marc-Andre Fleury, as speculation mounts that the three-time Stanley Cup champion could make a comeback, owing to the critical goaltending situation going on across the league, particularly with the Edmonton Oilers and other teams struggling to find a perfect goalie to address their goaltending situation.Fleury officially wrapped up his impressive 21-year NHL career after the 2024‚Äì25 season, leaving behind a remarkable legacy of around 1,050 games played, along with several Stanley Cup wins, and a well-earned reputation as one of the most respected goalies of his time.Despite that, the goalie recently made a short preseason appearance for the Pittsburgh Penguins, the team that selected him first overall in 2003, marking a beautiful full-circle moment of his professional journey. But his stint with the NHL does not end here. According to Bleacher Report's Frank Seravalli, he stated that it feels Fleury is done, but feels it would take a special circumstance for him to return to NHL action. Veteran NHL goalie Marc-Andre Fleury set to make a comeback to the league soon. According to reports, the last time hockey fans saw goaltender Marc-Andre Fleury in an NHL uniform was in September, when he returned to the Pittsburgh Penguins to play a period of a preseason game.The contest was supposed to bring his 21-year career full circle before he headed off to a well-deserved retirement. However, the lack of quality goaltending depth in the NHL trade market has sparked speculation that Fleury might be persuaded to return to action.TSN's Pierre LeBrun reported that some teams had checked in with Fleury. ESPN's Greg Wyshynski claimed he'd heard that the future Hall of Famer was open to a comeback. He suggested the three-time Stanley Cup champion might be a fit with the Edmonton Oilers.Meanwhile, speaking about the same, NHL Insider PierreVLeBrun stated, ‚ÄúProbably not surprising but hearing that some teams have checked in on Marc-Andre Fleury to see if there‚Äôs any chance at all he would consider playing again. Again, not surprised teams with goalie needs would want to check on it.‚ÄùDespite all the excitement, Fleury hasn't confirmed yet about making a comeback to the NHL. His retirement seems genuine, and lately, he's only been in several ceremonial events and special appearances, not a full-on return to competition.Analysts point out that while the thought of Fleury rejoining the league is fun to speculate about, there are some real challenges to consider, like contract negotiations, finding the right team fit, his physical condition, and most importantly, what Fleury himself really wants.
Article Summary: Veteran nhl goalie marc-andre fleury set to make a comeback to the league soon. Fleury officially wrapped up his impressive 21-year nhl career after the 2024‚Äì25 season, leaving behind a remarkable legacy of around 1,050 games played, along with several stanley cup wins.
